resources.string: Your device doesn\'t seem to have any flashlights. Unfortunately this app won\'t work without flashlights.
In order for this app to work properly and notify you when the alarm has gone off the notification permission in required. Please enable notifications in app settings.
The notification permissions is needed to show an alert when your alarm goes off. The app will not function properly with out this permission.
In order to properly start alarms, this app needs the Full Screen Intent Permission. Please enable this in the settings.
In order for this app to work properly as an alarm, the alarm permission in required. Please enable alarms in app settings.
The alarm permission is needed in order for this app to function as an alarm clock. The app will not function properly with out this permission.
